overview: Building on your acquired knowledge of leadership and development, this subject examines the distinct challenges of leadership within the development sector. Via real-world case studies, you will examine the complexities of leading within a changing global context, the implications of the post-heroic perspective and the relationship between ethics, social responsibility and leadership in the development context.

assessments.description: Engagement and quality of weekly contributions to group discussions.. 200 words (each)
Reflexive e-journal on weekly learning outcomes.. 200 words (each)
Group analysis of the distinctiveness of leadership in the development context (5 minute video).. 5 minutes
Case analysis and personal leadership reflexive summary.. 2500 words
